content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: After considering the location and condition of the apartment, I believe 550 Euro would be a fair price for monthly rent.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe the price is too low for such a prime location and the condition of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
